titles.title: Improved Access to Osteoporosis Testing Act of 2005
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate cost-sharing under the medicare program for bone mass measurements.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/30/2005--Introduced. Improved Access to Osteoporosis Testing Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate cost-sharing under Medicare for bone mass measurements, thus making the Federal payment 100 percent.
